rows.label: SVT_P01_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character starts a battle
by drawing melee weapon

rows.label: SVT_P02_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character starts a battle
by drawing ranged weapon

rows.label: SVT_P03_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character starts a battle
by performing an Art

rows.label: SVT_P07_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character lands
a critical hit on an enemy

rows.label: SVT_P08_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character attacks and
destroys an enemy appendage

rows.label: SVT_P09_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character halves the
HP of a much larger enemy

rows.label: SVT_P10_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character successfully
uses an Art's special effect

rows.label: SVT_P11_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character activates
an aura using an Art

rows.label: SVT_C01_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character delivers the
finishing blow to an enemy

rows.label: SVT_C02_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character evades three
consecutive enemy attacks

rows.label: SVT_C03_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character lands three
consecutive critical hits

rows.label: SVT_C04_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character witnesses a
change in weather during combat

rows.label: SVT_C05_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character sprints for
three or more seconds

rows.label: SVT_C06_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character gets healed
or buffed by a male ally

rows.label: SVT_C07_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character gets healed
or buffed by a female ally

rows.label: SVT_C08_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character attacks with
an Art while HP is below 30%

rows.label: SVT_C09_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character attacks
an enemy from above

rows.label: SVT_C10_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character inflicts
Topple on an enemy

rows.label: SVT_C11_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character inflicts
Stun on an enemy

rows.label: SVT_C12_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character inflicts
Sleep on an enemy

rows.label: SVT_C13_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character uses a Skell
to Bind an enemy

rows.label: SVT_C14_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Appendage of character's
Skell is destroyed

rows.label: SVT_C15_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Character's Skell is
wrecked and removed from battle

rows.label: SVT_C16_TriggerCaption
rows.name:
Trigger: Fuel of character's Skell
falls below 30% in combat
